column10: When you summon an [Earth] creature, draw a card.
Whenever you draw a card, you may instead <search> for a card. Do not reveal it.
When a friendly [Earth] creature is destroyed, you may summon this from your hand.
<Ready>.
You may only play this card if you have cast an [Earth] spell this turn.
Your other [Earth] creatures cannot be targeted by your opponent's spells.
When this enters the battlefield, draw a card.
[Earth] spells you cast targeting this cost nothing.
When this creature damages an opponent, exile the top card of their mana pool to draw a card.
The first time this creature is destroyed, resummon it.
When this is destroyed by combat damage, <search> for an [Earth] creature.
When this enters the battlefield, destroy a spell or item.
Whenever this creature would take damage, it takes 1 less damage.
When this enters the battlefield, draw a card.
When your opponent casts a spell for which this is a valid target, the spell must target this.

Cast when a friendly creature is attacked. Give it +0 / +4 until the end of this turn.
Cast when you declare a counterattack. Give your creatures +2 / +0 until the end of this turn.
Enchant a creature. It gains +2 / -1.

Destroy a creature. Your opponent adds the top card of their exile pile to their hand.
Enchant a creature. It gains "cannot attack".

At the end of each player's turn they draw a card.
<Search> for copies of all [Earth] creatures you control.

Enchant a creature. It gains +3 / +3.

Equip to a friendly creature. Equipped creature gains +1 / +0. When equipped creature is destroyed, summon a 1 / 1 [Earth] Living Spear creature token.
Equip to a friendly creature. After combat with an enemy creature, destroy this and the enemy creature.
<Search> for an [Earth] enchantment. The next [Earth] enchantment you play this turn costs [Earth] less.
You cannot play this and a creature on the same turn. Deal 1 damage to a creature, and if it takes damage destroy it.
At the start of your opponent's battle phase, you may select a friendly creature. It gains +1 / +0 and "cannot counterattack" until end of turn.
When this enters the battlefield, and at the start of your turn, <burn> 1. If it's a [Fire] creature, summon it and give it <ready>.
Your [Fire] creatures have +1 / +0. When a friendly [Fire] non-token creature is destroyed, summon a 0 / 1 [Fire] Phoenix Wisp token with <ready>.

Draw until you have 7 cards in hand or your deck is empty, then <burn> the rest of your deck. You cannot draw or <burn> cards.
